uploadText: Upload, insert or take a picture
readNowButtonInstructions: Tap here to start reading right away!
uploadInstructions: Tap here to upload or attach a document.
sendInstructions: Tap here to process the text or document!
extractionError: No text extracted from the document.
cameraInstructions: Take a picture or choose from your gallery, then the text will be extracted for you.

fixationPointInstructions: Drag this button to adjust your reading focus position.
bookmarkInstructions: Tap here to bookmark your current reading position.
searchInstructions: Use the search bar to quickly find books by name.
libraryInstructions: All books are listed here, grouped alphabetically.
addButtonInstructions: Tap the '+' button to upload a new document.
settingsTextInstructions: Tap here to change text size and fonts.
settingsColorInstructions: Tap here to change background and text colors.
settingsButtonInstructions: Tap here to adjust icon button sizes.
sampleTextInstructions: This shows you how your text will look.
decreaseButtonInstructions: Tap here to decrease the text size.
increaseButtonInstructions: Tap here to increase the text size.
chooseFontInstructions: Tap any of the 4 font options to change the style.
previewTextInstructions: This is how your text will look with the selected font.
adjustButtonInstructions: Use the minus and plus buttons below to change the text size.
homeInstructions: Tap here to return to the homepage.
saveImageContent: Do you want to save this image to the gallery?
